MEI.mensural

Mensural repertoire component declarations.

Elements in MEI.mensural

ligature, mensur, plica, proport, stem

Model Classes in MEI.mensural

model.eventLike.mensural, model.layerPart.mensural, model.scorePart.mensural, model.sectionPart.mensural, model.staffDefPart.mensural, model.staffPart.mensural

Macro Groups in MEI.mensural

– no macro groups defined in MEI.mensural – 

Attribute Classes in MEI.mensural

att.duration.quality, att.ligature.log, att.mensural.log, att.mensural.shared, att.note.anl.mensural, att.note.ges.mensural, att.note.log.mensural, att.note.vis.mensural, att.plica.anl, att.plica.ges, att.plica.log, att.plica.vis, att.proport.log, att.rest.ges.mensural, att.rest.vis.mensural, att.scoreDef.log.mensural, att.scoreDef.vis.mensural, att.staffDef.log.mensural, att.staffDef.vis.mensural, att.stem.anl, att.stem.ges, att.stem.log, att.stem.vis, att.stems.mensural

Data Typess in MEI.mensural
